name: OutOfQuotaTerminator
description: Automatically terminates responses when API quota is exceeded.
author: 十四行诗

quotaErrorMessages.title: Quota Error Keywords (one per line)
quotaErrorMessages.default:
Out of quota
API quota exceeded
429
insufficient_quota

toastMessage.title: Toast Message
toastMessage.description: Message to display when quota is exceeded.
toastMessage.default: API quota has been exhausted. Please try again later or change your API key.

toastDuration.title: Toast Duration (ms)
toastDuration.description: How long the toast message should be displayed.
